alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 2:22AM MDT until March 31 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Northeastern Yellowstone, Northern Carbon, Red Lodge Foothills, Southeastern Carbon, and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions including slick roads and poor visibility at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. The cold wet conditions will be dangerous for young livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for wet roads turning icy this evening. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
